title: La France Insoumise - Wikipedia
snippet: La France Insoumise was founded on 10 February 2016, based on the belief that traditional parties and political organisations no longer serve democracy.

title: La France Insoumise group - Wikipedia
snippet: The La France Insoumise – New Popular Front group (French: Groupe parlementaire La France Insoumise – Nouveau Front Populaire) is a parliamentary group in the National Assembly founded following the 2017 legislative election.
